app_metadata.description: Luanti is an open source voxel game-creation platform with easy modding and game creation
app_metadata.name: luanti
app_metadata.title: Luanti

attrs.label: Author
attrs.description:
Select any game from this list: https://content.luanti.org/packages/?type=game</br>
Either from the URL or in the website, you can find the author of the game.</br>
For example for https://content.luanti.org/packages/Luanti/minetest_game, the author is Luanti.

attrs.label: Game Name
attrs.description:
The name of the game to load in Luanti.</br>
You can find the game name in the URL of the game page.</br>
For example for https://content.luanti.org/packages/Luanti/minetest_game, the game name is minetest_game.

attrs.label: Release
attrs.description:
If you want to use the latest release, leave this field empty. </br>
The release of the game to use.</br>
You can find the release in the URL of the game page.</br>
Copy the URL of the release and get the release id</br>
For example for https://content.luanti.org/packages/Luanti/minetest_game/releases/31703/download, the release id is 31703.

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode
attrs.description:
The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>
- None: The port will not be exposed or published.</br>
Note: If the Dockerfile defines an EXPOSE directive,
the port will still be exposed for inter-container communication regardless of this setting.

enum.description: Publish port on the host for external access

attrs.label: Host IPs
attrs.description: IPs on the host to bind this port

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description: Bind to the host network. It's recommended to keep this disabled.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.
